main event: A bright light was observed moving in a zigzag manner near Cleveland Lakefront Airport on 6 March 1956.
interesting points: The object was reported to be moving at a great speed and changed positions frequently., Multiple witnesses, including the control tower operator, confirmed the sighting., The object was initially seen by several people on the ground., The sighting did not result in any radar tracking or photographic evidence., The object was described as a glowing light in the sky.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: control tower operator and several persons on the ground
